chunks.zh: 是我小气了吗
chunks.en: Am I being petty?

chunks.zh: 初五返程，表哥临时安排相亲。
chunks.en: On the fifth day of the new year, my cousin arranged a blind date on short notice.

chunks.zh: 初六联系后聊得不错。
chunks.en: We contacted each other on the sixth day and had a good chat.

chunks.zh: 初七简单聊了半小时。
chunks.en: On the seventh day, we had a brief half-hour chat.

chunks.zh: 初八开工，为找话题，我谎称公司发 200 开工红包（实际只有 100 ），分 100 给她（她初八开店），说是请她喝奶茶。
chunks.en: On the eighth day, work started. To find a topic, I lied and said the company gave out a 200 yuan back-to-work bonus (actually only 100), and I gave her 100 (she opened her store on the eighth), saying it was to treat her to bubble tea.

chunks.zh: 她未回复，当晚再问仍无反应。
chunks.en: She didn't reply, and when I asked again that evening, there was still no response.

chunks.zh: 初九红包退回，表哥问我情况怎么样了，我把情况和他说明，并且怀疑是她嫌红包少（初六她提过喜欢大方、诚实的人），表哥也觉得 100 太少，至少 300 。
chunks.en: On the ninth day, the red envelope was returned. My cousin asked me how it was going. I explained the situation to him and suspected that she thought the red envelope was too small (she mentioned on the sixth day that she liked generous and honest people). My cousin also thought 100 was too little, at least 300.

chunks.zh: 表哥就去找中间人探口风，中间人后来回复，她说没怎么聊，因为没见过面，话题少。
chunks.en: My cousin went to the intermediary to test the waters. The intermediary later replied that she said they hadn't chatted much because they hadn't met and there were few topics.

chunks.zh: 初九晚 21 点多，她回复说初八太忙，但我仍觉得再忙也不至于不回消息。
chunks.en: On the evening of the ninth, after 9 PM, she replied saying she was too busy on the eighth, but I still felt that even if she was busy, she shouldn't have not replied.

chunks.zh: 她在老家开服装店，也是初 8 开始营业，就是因为我想到她说她喜欢大方的，一开始我想着要不要买花篮送她，但是又想她的店也不是第一次开业，买花篮也不合适。
chunks.en: She opened a clothing store in her hometown, which also started business on the 8th. Because I remembered that she said she liked generous people, I initially thought about whether to buy her a flower basket, but then I thought that her store was not opening for the first time, and buying a flower basket was not appropriate.

chunks.zh:
所以就说发 100 给她请她喝奶茶，目的就是为了找点话题聊天

不知道大家怎么看这事
chunks.en: So I said I would give her 100 yuan to treat her to bubble tea, the purpose was to find some topics to chat about. I don't know what everyone thinks about this.

chunks.zh: 没开始就别自我反思，下一个
chunks.en: Don't start self-reflecting before it even begins, next one.

chunks.zh: 一年了,每周四我都换着法,让你 v50,你都没有 v,但是对她一 v 就是 v100,伤心了
chunks.en: It's been a year, every Thursday I've been trying to get you to 'v' me 50 (yuan), but you never did. But you 'v' her 100 right away, I'm heartbroken.

chunks.zh: 钱是给女人看的，不是给女人花的靠钱找话题，这思路就不对
chunks.en: Money is for women to see, not for women to spend. Relying on money to find topics is the wrong approach.

chunks.zh: 老哥，不是我说你啊。
chunks.en: Bro, I'm not trying to criticize you.

chunks.zh: 上来就发红包不合适，你还不如直接给人家点杯奶茶。
chunks.en: Giving a red envelope right away is not appropriate, you might as well just order her a cup of bubble tea.

chunks.zh: 开工红包 200 块钱分他一半是啥操作？
chunks.en: What's the idea behind splitting a 200 yuan back-to-work bonus in half with her?

chunks.zh: 人家为啥要跟你分这钱。
chunks.en: Why would she want to split this money with you?

chunks.zh: 要我也不想搭理你， 不回复你消息也能说的通，因为她压根不知道怎么聊下去。。。。
chunks.en: If it were me, I wouldn't want to bother with you either. It makes sense that she didn't reply to your message, because she simply didn't know how to continue the conversation...

chunks.zh: 不知道你能不能感受到，你潜意识里有觉得，我给你钱了，你该陪我聊一会儿吧，给钱会暴露需求感，女生会下意识远离你的
chunks.en: I don't know if you can feel it, but subconsciously you feel, 'I gave you money, you should chat with me for a while.' Giving money exposes neediness, and girls will subconsciously stay away from you.

chunks.zh: 换个角度，一个女的跟你相亲，跟你聊了两天，第三天跟你说公司发了红包，分你一百，你会怎么想？
chunks.en: From another perspective, if a woman had a blind date with you, chatted with you for two days, and then on the third day told you that the company had given out a red envelope and split 100 with you, what would you think?

chunks.zh: 我只想到了一个词，“饿狼扑食”。
chunks.en: The only phrase that comes to mind is 'a hungry wolf pouncing on its prey'.

chunks.zh: 全天下的女人都喜欢那种表面上吹牛逼的男人；你可以没有钱，但是你要让她感觉到你很有趣；给她看到你很有钱，哪里玩哪里打卡，出入什么高档场所；女人只会爱上对她扣扣嗖嗖的“有钱人”；只要你过得了自己的底线，女人好骗的。
chunks.en: All women in the world like men who brag on the surface; you may not have money, but you have to make her feel that you are very interesting; let her see that you are very rich, where you play and check in, and what high-end places you go to; women will only fall in love with 'rich people' who are stingy with them; as long as you can get past your own bottom line, women are easy to deceive.

chunks.zh: 自古真心都是被辜负的。
chunks.en: Since ancient times, sincerity has always been betrayed.

chunks.zh: 马斯克管理手底下几千亿市值的公司，也不忘回复推特上的留言，你跟我说她太忙没空回复你。
chunks.en: Elon Musk manages a company with a market value of hundreds of billions, and doesn't forget to reply to comments on Twitter. You're telling me she's too busy to reply to you?

chunks.zh: cut it out bro
chunks.en: Cut it out, bro.

chunks.zh: 看到第四句就看不下去了，今日🐢2ex
chunks.en: I couldn't keep reading after the fourth sentence, today's 🐢2ex (referencing a Chinese internet forum)

chunks.zh: ~ ~我就不嘲笑你了，毕竟你挺善良的。
chunks.en: I won't laugh at you, after all, you're quite kind.

chunks.zh: 但你这一套操作，嗯！
chunks.en: But this set of operations of yours, hmm!

chunks.zh: 给女生吓到了，今天我收了这 100 ，明天你不得操我的 B 啊！
chunks.en: The girl was scared, if I take this 100 today, you'll probably want to f*** me tomorrow!

chunks.zh: 要不咱俩聊几天试试，我比她肯定强，你 V 我 50 就行
chunks.en: Why don't you and I chat for a few days, I'm definitely better than her, you can just 'v' me 50.

chunks.zh: 哪有上来直接给钱的😓太冒昧了吧
chunks.en: Who gives money directly right away 😓 That's too presumptuous, right?

chunks.zh: 红包和礼物只能在某些场合起到润滑作用，无法触及内心深处的真实情感需求。
chunks.en: Red envelopes and gifts can only play a lubricating role in certain situations and cannot touch the true emotional needs deep within.

chunks.zh: “请她喝奶茶”，本质上是在用物质去制造联系和话题。
chunks.en: 'Treating her to bubble tea' is essentially using material things to create connections and topics.

chunks.zh: 在相亲这种情况下，双方都在试探对方，并不完全了解彼此，如果一方过于依赖物质来推动关系，可能会被另一方解读为“急功近利”或“缺乏耐心”。
chunks.en: In a blind date situation, both parties are testing each other and do not fully understand each other. If one party relies too much on material things to promote the relationship, it may be interpreted by the other party as 'impatient' or 'being eager for quick success'.

chunks.zh: 建议从她的生活、兴趣爱好、工作、情感经历等方面入手，寻找共鸣。
chunks.en: It is recommended to start from her life, hobbies, work, and emotional experiences to find resonance.

chunks.zh: 例如：她开的服装店可以一个话题切入点。
chunks.en: For example, her opening a clothing store could be a topic entry point.

chunks.zh: 你可以问她开店的感受、遇到的挑战，甚至她对于店铺未来的规划，这不仅能让她感受到你对她的关心，还能促使你们进行更自然和深入的对话。
chunks.en: You can ask her about her feelings about opening the store, the challenges she has encountered, and even her plans for the future of the store. This will not only make her feel your concern for her, but also encourage more natural and in-depth conversations.

chunks.zh: 我想了一些话题，仅供参考：1.
chunks.en: I thought of some topics for reference only: 1.

chunks.zh: 开店一定很忙吧，最近有没有什么让我可以帮忙的事情？
chunks.en: Opening a store must be very busy, is there anything I can help you with lately?

chunks.zh: 有的话，尽管开口哦～  ( 展现出你对她生活的关注和对她事业的支持 )2.
chunks.en: If there is, feel free to ask哦～ (Demonstrates your concern for her life and support for her career) 2.

chunks.zh: 你自己最喜欢你店里的哪一款衣服呢？
chunks.en: Which piece of clothing in your store do you like the most?

chunks.zh: 为什么呀？ （ 了解对方的喜好、品味 ）3.
chunks.en: Why? (Understanding the other person's preferences and taste) 3.

chunks.zh: 开店以来，你有没有什么‘爆款’服装？
chunks.en: Since opening the store, have you had any 'hit' clothing items?

chunks.zh: 有没有什么顾客的评价让你特别开心呢 ( 让她分享做生意的成就感，与顾客的有趣互动 )4.
chunks.en: Are there any customer reviews that made you particularly happy? (Let her share the sense of accomplishment of doing business and the interesting interactions with customers) 4.

chunks.zh: 你觉得哪种颜色或者款式的衣服最能代表你现在的心情呀？ ( 情感与穿衣风格结合，衣服也是表达自我的一种方式 )通过日常的细节关心来建立情感联系，远比一次性通过红包来加深印象要有效～
chunks.en: What color or style of clothing do you think best represents your current mood? (Combining emotions with clothing style, clothing is also a way of expressing oneself) Establishing emotional connections through daily details is far more effective than deepening the impression with a red envelope.

chunks.zh: 很难见到 ATM 会思考 可惜思考的是自己吐的钱不够多 难绷
chunks.en: It's rare to see an ATM think, but sadly it's thinking that the money it spat out wasn't enough, hard to resist laughing.

chunks.zh: @M48A1 就是那种令人恶心反胃的油腻风吗
chunks.en: @M48A1 Is that the disgusting, nauseating, greasy style?

chunks.zh: 首先是没看上，看上的她觉得你个性就这样兼容兼容吧，没看上的她觉得你条件就这样直接拒绝吧
chunks.en: First of all, she's not interested. If she were interested, she'd think 'that's just your personality, I can be compatible'. If she's not interested, she'll think 'that's just your situation, I'll reject you directly'.

chunks.zh: 然后，相亲还是要见面，有眼缘就主动，第一次就上一垒牵手，尽快朝二垒三垒全垒打发展，A 进去了之后会让她觉得是你欠她，关系就牢固了
chunks.en: So, you still have to meet on a blind date, and if you feel attracted, take the initiative. Get to first base (holding hands) on the first date, and quickly move towards second base, third base, and a home run. Once A goes in, she will feel like you owe her, and the relationship will be solid.

chunks.zh: 100 真不如不给，给了反而让对方摸清楚你的底了。
chunks.en: It's really better not to give the 100 yuan. Giving it actually lets the other person figure out your bottom line.

chunks.zh: 你没啥问题，也不小气，下一个就是了。
chunks.en: You don't have any problems, and you're not petty, just move on to the next one.

chunks.zh: 别动不动就给人钱好吗？
chunks.en: Don't just give people money whenever you feel like it, okay?

chunks.zh: 给钱送礼物也得师出有名，上来就给钱人家凭什么收你的钱？
chunks.en: Giving money or gifts should have a valid reason. Why should people accept your money if you just give it to them right away?
